explanation: [0-0] On a snowy ground, a right hand wearing a purple glove holds a knife, with a red reflection on it. There are steps of varying heights on the snow.

[0-3] Next, an arm wearing a yellow sleeve reaches out from the right, holding the knife and starts cutting the snow around a black tabletop, leaving a cuboid-shaped block of snow. Pink hair appears on the right.

[0-3] Next, an arm wearing a yellow sleeve reaches out from the right, holding the knife and starts cutting the snow around a black tabletop, leaving a cuboid-shaped block of snow. Pink hair appears on the right.

[0-3] Next, an arm wearing a yellow sleeve reaches out from the right, holding the knife and starts cutting the snow around a black tabletop, leaving a cuboid-shaped block of snow. Pink hair appears on the right.

[3-6] Then the scene switches, a lady in a yellow top appears in the picture, with long pink hair and exquisite makeup. Behind her is a building with beige curtains and glass walls. She bends down and picks up the cut snow block from the table, puts it on a pink plate, holds the plate in her left hand, and walks to the right with a happy smile, holding the knife in her right hand.

[3-6] Then the scene switches, a lady in a yellow top appears in the picture, with long pink hair and exquisite makeup. Behind her is a building with beige curtains and glass walls. She bends down and picks up the cut snow block from the table, puts it on a pink plate, holds the plate in her left hand, and walks to the right with a happy smile, holding the knife in her right hand.

[3-6] Then the scene switches, a lady in a yellow top appears in the picture, with long pink hair and exquisite makeup. Behind her is a building with beige curtains and glass walls. She bends down and picks up the cut snow block from the table, puts it on a pink plate, holds the plate in her left hand, and walks to the right with a happy smile, holding the knife in her right hand.

[6-8] Afterward, the scene switches, a left hand wearing a purple glove places the pink plate with the snow block on a white table top, then the right hand wearing a purple glove squeezes some red liquid onto the snow block, followed by sprinkling some colorful sugar sprinkles.

[6-8] Afterward, the scene switches, a left hand wearing a purple glove places the pink plate with the snow block on a white table top, then the right hand wearing a purple glove squeezes some red liquid onto the snow block, followed by sprinkling some colorful sugar sprinkles.

[8-14] Then the scene switches to the lady in the yellow top, sitting at the table in the room. On the white wall behind her hangs a white cooker hood and red cabinets, as well as a picture frame. Some kitchenware is placed underneath. She looks up happily, excitedly waving a knife and fork in front of her, then looks down. The snow block on the white plate has turned into a red liquid. The lady in the yellow top puts down the knife and fork in shock, picks up the plate with both hands and shakes it. The red liquid spills on the white table top. She puts down the plate and cries sadly.
